Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Courtyard by Marriott Ahmedabad in Ahmedabad (Satellite), you'll be minutes from Gulmohar Park Mall and close to ISCON Mall. This 5-star hotel is within the vicinity of Gujarat University and Sardar Patel Stadium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 164 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Satellite programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages and body treatments. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a 24-hour health club, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Ahmedabad? This hotel has 7492 square feet (696 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

With a stay at Courtyard by Marriott Ahmedabad in Ahmedabad (Satellite), you'll be minutes from Gulmohar Park Mall and close to ISCON Mall. This 5-star hotel is within the vicinity of Gujarat University and Sardar Patel Stadium.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Gulmohar Park Mall - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
ISCON Mall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Gujarat University - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Sardar Patel Stadium - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Sanskar Kendra Museum - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Manek Chowk - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Jama Masjid Mosque - 7.6 km / 4.8 mi
Gandhi Ashram - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Hathi Singh Temple - 8 km / 5 mi
Swaminarayan Temple - 8.1 km / 5 mi
Sidi Bashir Mosque and the Shaking Minarets - 9 km / 5.6 mi
Naginawadi - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi
Adalaj Vav - 17 km / 10.6 mi
Swaminarayan Complex - 27.9 km / 17.4 mi
Lothal - 62.6 km / 38.9 mi

The preferred airport for Courtyard by Marriott Ahmedabad is Ahmedabad (AMD-Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Intl.) - 12.1 km / 7.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

RoomType.text: Double or Twin DELUXE GUEST ROOM

SUITE EXECUTIVE ONE BEDROOM
Suite Executive
Double or Twin DELUXE GUEST ROOM
Twin (Deluxe Room Guest room 1 King or 2 Twin/Single Bed(s))

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Please note: Please note that if the rate is inclusive of breakfast, this will only be provided for a maximum number of 2 guests regardless of how many guests are confirmed for the room. Additional guests will have to pay for the breakfast charge directly to the hotel. Please be advised that if booking for 3 or more guests, there is an extra person fee not included in the rate and this is to be paid directly to the hotel on arrival. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
